APEX PONDS
Apex ponds were originally big clay pits that were very important to the brick works.A railway once came to the ponds to collect the tiles and bricks which once came from the important local brick works.The trains came to export the brick around the country.The works fired the brick in kilns which had shelves to lay the brick on.After the bricks had been fired they were taken out of the and stored ready for transporting. Later on,the brick works were demolished,and the rubble was used to surface Apex Ponds car park. Apex is now a recreation area,fishermen and Sea Scouts use the ponds.A big{adventure playground}is being built nearby.
